# [Interview #134: Rotterdam Signing Report - Aan'allein, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=134#15)

#### Aan'allein

Does the Black Ajah contain all Aes Sedai who are Darkfriends?

#### Robert Jordan

Yes.
